summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation will convene on April 4, 2024, at 12:00 PM at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES. The meeting aims to discuss strategies and initiatives to address homelessness in the Dallas area, with options for public attendance both in-person and virtually.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment Session  
3. Approval of March 7, 2024, Meeting Minutes  
4. Presentation on Texas Homeless Networks Data  
5. Review of the Homeless Response System Quarterly Report  
6. Discussion on the Revision/Draft of Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws  
7. System Performance Committee Report  
8. Discussion on Dallas ISD Initiatives ("Big Dreams")  
9. Proposed Items for Future Meetings  
10. Announcements of Upcoming Events  

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will feature a presentation by Eric Samuels from the Texas Homeless Network and a quarterly report from Christine Crossley regarding the homeless response system. A significant focus will be on revising the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws, which may lead to policy changes.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and discuss the proposed revisions to the Articles of Incorporation and Bylaws. Public comments will also be collected, and future agenda items will be proposed without debate or vote during this session.
